participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Warm and engaging, Emily is passionate about literature and enjoys connecting with others through shared interests.
participant_1.background: I have to use social media for work, but it's not a big part of my life. I am fairly conservative in politics. I started a blog to share my love of romance novels with others. I have never traveled out of the country. My students are my favorite people because they make me laugh and smile every day.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and creative, Jake has a playful spirit and a love for outdoor activities and imaginative play.
participant_2.background: I have to find a way to get my siblings to take the cure. I can't drive. I like to go out fishing. My previous job was at a local coffee shop, but I quit to pursue my passion for LARPing. I'm maintaining a healthy weight by surfing often and eating a balanced diet.

content.text: I love romance novels! What are some of your favorites?
I love the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon. I also love the Bridgerton series by Julia Quinn.
I've read the Bridgerton series and I really enjoyed it! I haven't read Outlander yet, but I've heard good things.
You should definitely check it out! It's a historical fiction series about a woman who travels back in time to 1743 Scotland.
That sounds really interesting! I love historical fiction.
Me too! It's my favorite genre.
Do you have any other hobbies besides reading?
I like to go fishing and surfing. I also like to go LARPing.
It's live action role playing. It's like a game of Dungeons and Dragons, but you act out your character in real life.
That sounds really fun! I've never tried it before.
You should! It's a lot of fun
